translations.By default, the simulation starts on Ear: By default, the simulation starts on Earth in 2020, but you can select a different period or planet
translations.Display radiation as either Waves (quali: Display radiation as either Waves (qualitative) or Fluxes arrows (quantitative)
translations.Click Play to begin the simulation: Click Play to begin the simulation
translations.To change Earth's climate, pause the sim: To change Earth's climate, pause the simulation, alter one or more variables, then click Play again
translations.When variables are changed in Fluxes mod: When variables are changed in Fluxes mode, arrows will begin blinking, indicating that these fluxes are projected to change
